pkgmetadata.longdescription: [![PyPI version](https://badge.fury.io/py/dashport.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/py/dashport) [![Documentation Status](https://readthedocs.org/projects/dashport/badge/?version=latest)](https://dashport.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest)# dashportDashport - An easy and safe way to use curses## InstallationYou can install from source code by cloning down this repo and running:```pip install .```Alternatively, use this to install from PyPI:```pip install dashport```
